[Scar-Thick Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2419) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 51 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Glorious, storied scars cover and protect much of your body. Your DC on flat checks to end [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) is reduced from 15 to 10, or from 10 to 5 after receiving especially appropriate assistance.
